summary: This collection of documents details the activities and personnel of the Cuban Mission to the United Nations (CMUN) and the DGI (Cuban Intelligence Directorate) Center in New York, including Rogelio Rodriguez Lopez's activities in Mexico City. It covers personnel assignments, travel, and communications between Cuban officials and other parties.
tags: Cuban Mission to the United Nations
title: Cuban Uy Mission and DGI Center Analysis/Rogelio Rodriguez Lopez Activities
recipient: Chief, WH/COG, Chief of Station, WH/MIAMI, Chief, Domestic Operations
sender: Chief of Station, WH/MIAMI, Chief, Domestic Operations, Chief of Base, New York
